title: Killer Asteroids - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/5/19
itunes:title: Killer Asteroids - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/5/19
description:
George Noory and reporter Gordon Dillow explore massive asteroids that could extinguish all life on Earth if they hit the planet, efforts to protect Earth from the asteroid hits and whether the public would ever be told if there was an impending threat.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
